attrs.name: src
attrs.desc: Set the path of the preview image. Image source, which is the same as the original image source

attrs.name: fit
attrs.desc: Determine how the image adapts to the container frame, which is the same as the native object-fit. The optional values of this attribute are fill / contain / cover / none / scale-down

attrs.name: scroll-container
attrs.desc: Container for listening to scroll events after lazy loading is enabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the parent element whose overflow value is auto or scroll.

attrs.name: z-index
attrs.desc: Set the z-index of the image preview
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 2000.

slots.name: placeholder
slots.desc: Placeholder content that is not loaded to the image

slots.name: error
slots.desc: Content that fails to be loaded
